full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: What should I do to prepare for a job interview ? Turn 2 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: Sort of , but I could know more , I guess .
response_1: Do you know many people ?
response_2: An understanding of the basic workings of a company and the services or goods it provides is essential . Do you have that ?

full_dialogue: Turn 11 [Speaker_1]: I heard that this stock would go up . Hum , I will take it at current price . Turn 12 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 13 [Speaker_1]: Yes , please .
response_1: I'll give you 10 shares . Would you like to share your pick ?
response_2: So , now I will buy you . Are you sure ?

full_dialogue: Turn 5 [Speaker_1]: Please fill out this exchange form and I'll need to see your passport . Don't forget to sign your name at the bottom . Turn 6 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 7 [Speaker_1]: Here is your RIB , the exchange form and receipt and your passport . Please check the amount .
response_1: OK . Here you are .
response_2: Oh , right , of course . Here you go .

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: Do you have any questions before you commit yourself to this ? Turn 2 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: The subscription fee is charged at a rate of 1.2 % . But for redeeming , a rate of a usual 0.5 % , we shall charge you 1.6 % if you apply to buy it after the fund-raising period .
response_1: Actually , yes I do . I was wondering about the subscription fee . And how much will you charge me during the time of redeeming this new fund ?
response_2: Yes , can you tell me more about the Nick lacked features of our product ?

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: Good morning . How can I help you ? Turn 2 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: Have you filled out an application form ?
response_1: I'd like to open a new account .
response_2: I would like to check my luggage , please .

full_dialogue: Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: Sure.Please sign your name here ... and here . Turn 4 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 5 [Speaker_1]: Thanks.How would you like them ?
response_1: Thank you , Mr.Rem .
response_2: Ok , here you are .

full_dialogue: Turn 13 [Speaker_1]: it's a job at a recruitment agency . Turn 14 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 15 [Speaker_1]: well , you have plenty of experience job hunting . I think you'd be the perfect person for the job !
response_1: that's interesting . Do you think they'd hire me ?
response_2: oh , so you've given me many ideas ! When do you think I should apply ?

full_dialogue: Turn 5 [Speaker_1]: I am kind of confused . Turn 6 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 7 [Speaker_1]: I'm not quite sure .
response_1: I can help you figure it out . What did you think of the movie ?
response_2: Next you fill in all of your hours for each day and total them . Do you know how to show time on a 24 - hour clock ?

full_dialogue: Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: I already have . Turn 4 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 5 [Speaker_1]: I mailed in an absentee ballot .
response_1: How did you do that ?
response_2: What did you do to support your campaign ?

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: These three hours chatting with you have been very ... interesting . Could you please tell us why we're here ? Turn 2 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: What is our time frame ?
response_1: Sure . The reason I'm here is because our time frame is profile-knit .
response_2: I want a new brand image . Something creative , something strong . Make no mistake , something with ... resolve !

full_dialogue: Turn 5 [Speaker_1]: This way , please . Turn 6 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 7 [Speaker_1]: You're welcome .
response_1: Thank you .
response_2: Thank you .

full_dialogue: Turn 9 [Speaker_1]: that's exactly why I decided to quit the job and find a new one . Turn 10 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 11 [Speaker_1]: that's right . I am not the only one who has done this . Job hopping is quite common in the IT industry .
response_1: I see . Well , I'm glad you did . And we're going to keep talking about this , right ?
response_2: this way , you'll earn more at the new work place .

full_dialogue: Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: Did you vote for him ? Turn 4 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 5 [Speaker_1]: I voted for him .
response_1: I sure did . How about you ?
response_2: Yes , I did .

full_dialogue: Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: Well , we offer 60 - day or 90 - day loans . The balance of the loan is to be repaid in full by the end of the specified period . Turn 4 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 5 [Speaker_1]: Unfortunately , not .
response_1: Is there any flexibility on that ?
response_2: Is that what the loan itself is ?

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: Could I have a word with you ? Turn 2 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: I am disappointed with your work lately .
response_1: Sure , what is it ?
response_2: I would like to ask you a question .

full_dialogue: Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: That's no trouble , Sir . Turn 4 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 5 [Speaker_1]: Yes , that's just one of the services we offer in our Personal Financing Program .
response_1: Well , do you have any payment plans with me ?
response_2: I'm mostly interested in the personalized services you offer , with stock market news , etc . It sounds just perfect for me , as I'm too busy to be constantly at the computer checking the performance .

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: Medicine Industry , this is Peter Bush speaking , can I help you ? Turn 2 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: May I know who's calling ?
response_1: Yes , the doorbell is off the left .
response_2: Good afternoon , could you connect this call with Mr Brown , please

full_dialogue: Turn 7 [Speaker_1]: OK . I'll take T / T . Turn 8 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 9 [Speaker_1]: All right . Here it is .
response_1: Would you please fill in this application form ?
response_2: I'll pick you up at 6 o'clock sharp .

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: Welcome back , Sir . I trust the materials were helpful to you ? Turn 2 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: Your credit is fine , Sir . Now , tell me , what is it that you need the loan for ?
response_1: Indeed . I've decided to go for the Petty Consumer Loan . That is , if my credit rating is satisfactory .
response_2: I sure did .

full_dialogue: Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: You voted for him , right ? Turn 4 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 5 [Speaker_1]: I did , too .
response_1: Yeah . How did you know ?
response_2: Did you vote for him , because I know that I did .

full_dialogue: Turn 7 [Speaker_1]: Then what do we do ? Turn 8 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 9 [Speaker_1]: What about listing my interests and affiliations next ?
response_1: If I were you , I would expect to spend less than $ 300 a month .
response_2: Put your job experience first , if that is more impressive than your education .
